name: remove-list-element-request
description: Represents a BACnet RemoveListElement request, used to remove elements from a property list of an object.

fields.name: object-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the object from which elements are to be removed.

fields.name: property-identifier
fields.description: The property identifier specifying the list.

fields.name: property-array-index
fields.description: Optional array index for the property list.

fields.name: list-of-elements
fields.description: The elements to be removed from the list.
